data.name: Mokoko X - Artwork
data.detailed_description:
The Book of Mokoko X English/Japanese

50 pages long digital book of Mokoko X. All the ladies, enemies, their absurd stories/dialogues and any other text content are gathered in this book.

High Resolution Videos

  • 13 clips from each of the ladies from the game are available in high resolution. In total, there are 104 videos in .mpeq file format. Adult content is included.
  • 8 Mokoko X story videos

Game Covers

Some of the cover/banners are included in this DLC.

Ladies
Lovely ladies from the game:
Ayane, Iren, Issa, Yoko, Misaki, Julia, Ruby, Mei

data.short_description: This deluxe content DLC contains the Book of Mokoko X, and 104 high resolution videos of the ladies.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 or higher
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or above
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 or higher
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Kernel 3.0 or above
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 or higher
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This content includes nudity and sexual references suitable only for mature audiences.
